script.name: plugin.jj.colour.by.race.xrm.setnames
script.description: Overwrite XRM station names with coloured names.
script.sourceplaintext:
* ************************************************ * SCRIPT NAME: XRM Setnames * DESCRIPTION: Overwrite names set in al.xrm.corescripts.main.xml with coloured names from our own t file. Runs once at start of game session. * AUTHOR: JJ DATE: 23 January 2023 * ************************************************ do if$debug write to log file #$debug append=[TRUE] value='Setting XRM Stations' $xrmRaces=array alloc: size=7 $xrmRaces[0] = Terran $xrmRaces[1] = Yaki $xrmRaces[2] = Paranid $xrmRaces[3] = Boron $xrmRaces[4] = Teladi $xrmRaces[5] = Split $xrmRaces[6] = Argon $stations=array alloc: size=0
* Trinity Corp. Headquarters $station=array alloc: size=3 $station[0] = 80148 $station[1] = OTrinity Corp.X Headquarters $station[2] = 2 append $station to array $stations * Holy Dimensions Headquarters $station=array alloc: size=3 $station[0] = 80150 $station[1] = OHoly DimensionsX Headquarters $station[2] = 2 append $station to array $stations * Waverider Corp. Headquarters $station=array alloc: size=3 $station[0] = 80152 $station[1] = GWaverider Corp.X Headquarters $station[2] = 3 append $station to array $stations * Creditania Headquarters $station=array alloc: size=3 $station[0] = 80154 $station[1] = YCreditaniaX Headquarters $station[2] = 4 append $station to array $stations * Thuruk's Inc. Headquarters $station=array alloc: size=3 $station[0] = 80156 $station[1] = MThuruk's Inc.X Headquarters $station[2] = 5 append $station to array $stations
* ****************** $sectors=array alloc: size=6 $sectors[0] = ATF AForsetiX $sectors[1] = WeaRver's TempestX $sectors[2] = RedRemptionX $sectors[3] = Dark Space AClusterX $sectors[4] = McCAallumX ARelayX $sectors[5] = FarBpointB BRelayX
* AGI Task Force Command $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 75000 $station[1] = WSaturnX Research Station $station[2] = 0 $station[3] = WSaturnX Research Station $station[4] = 0 append $station to array $stations * AGI Task Force Military Police $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 75022 $station[1] = Military Outpost $station[2] = 0 $station[3] = Military Outpost $station[4] = 0 append $station to array $stations * AGI Task Force Disaster Control $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 75032 $station[1] = Orbital Freight Dock $station[2] = 0 $station[3] = Military Base $station[4] = 0 append $station to array $stations * AGI Task Force Technical Emergency Service $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 75034 $station[1] = WOrbital Defence StationX $station[2] = 0 $station[3] = WATFX Research Base $station[4] = 0 append $station to array $stations * AGI Task Force Intelligence Service $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 75538 $station[1] = Communications Facility $station[2] = 0 $station[3] = Communications Facility $station[4] = 0 append $station to array $stations * Yaki Flotilla Command $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 75008 $station[1] = RYakiX Flotilla Command $station[2] = 1 $station[3] = RYakiX Flotilla Command $station[4] = 1 append $station to array $stations * Yaki Battle Group Command $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 75010 $station[1] = RYakiX Flotilla Command $station[2] = 1 $station[3] = RYakiX Flotilla Command $station[4] = 2 append $station to array $stations * Dark Space Headquarters $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 80382 $station[1] = WDark SpaceX Headquarters $station[2] = 0 $station[3] = WDark SpaceX Headquarters $station[4] = 3 append $station to array $stations * McCallum Station $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 81114 $station[1] = Military Base $station[2] = 0 $station[3] = Military Base $station[4] = 4 append $station to array $stations * Farpoint Station $station=array alloc: size=5 $station[0] = 81116 $station[1] = Military Outpost $station[2] = 6 $station[3] = Military Outpost $station[4] = 5 append $station to array $stations $i=size of array $stations while$i dec $i= $station=$stations[$i] $textID=$station[0] $class=$station[1] $race=$station[2] $race=$xrmRaces[$race] $size=size of array $station if$size == 3 $station=find station in galaxy: startsector=KinGgdom EndX class or type=$class race=$race flags=null refobj=$class serial=null max.jumps=999 else $sector=$station[4] $sector=$sectors[$sector] $refobj=$station[3] $station=find station: sector=$sector class or type=$class race=$race flags=null refobj=$refobj maxdist=0 maxnum=1 refpos=null end $name=read text: page=17 id=$textID $station ->set name to $name $station ->set local variable: name='JJ.Set.New.Name' value=[TRUE] end return null

comment.var: DESCRIPTION: Overwrite names set in al.xrm.corescripts.main.xml with coloured names from our own t file. Runs once at start of game session.
AGI Task Force Technical Emergency Service

sval.val: Overwrite XRM station names with coloured names.
DESCRIPTION: Overwrite names set in al.xrm.corescripts.main.xml with coloured names from our own t file. Runs once at start of game session.
AGI Task Force Technical Emergency Service
